text: (musalamaanon) kya tum is baat se dar gae ki (rasool ke) kaan mein baat kahane se pahale khairaat kar lo to jab tum log (itana sa kaam) na kar sake aur khuda ne tumhen maaf kar diya to paabandee se namaaz padho aur zakaat dete raho aur khuda usake rasool kee itaat karo aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase baakhabar hai
